subject: Pedal axis values
description_text:
Hi,

My Simsonn X Ultra pedals seem to be doing the oddest thing in iRacing. I can’t calibrate the controls because the pedals seem to be engaged but aren’t. I’ve sent a video for reference. 

Thanks! 



Sent from my iPhone

conversations.body_text: Hi chance lyon,  In the “Settings - Update” section, click “Manual Firmware Update,” then navigate to the pedals-firmware folder → pedals folder → and select the proxultra.sfu file to update. This firmware will disable the 4th axis.
Unfortunately I have tried this and it didn’t work.
Does it matter if I didn’t have the clutch pedal installed when I did the manual update?

Hi chance lyon,     Please download VKB Joy Tester to check, and send me a screenshot of the SIMSONN device status so I can see if the RX axis is disabled.     https://www.vkbcontrollers.com/pages/downloads
